# Exploratory Data Analysis of Kemmeren 2014

Gene expression (microarray) for about 1500 single gene deletion yeast mutants. The data were obtained from http://deleteome.holstegelab.nl. Click downloads and select all mutants, not excluding wild type variable genes.

```
wget -P data http://deleteome.holstegelab.nl/data/downloads/deleteome_all_mutants_controls.txt
```

```{r}
source("DeleteomeCleaning.R")
library(Rtsne)
library(ggplot2)
res<-prcomp(t(deleteomeData))
pd<-as.data.frame(res$x)
#ggplot(pd,aes(x="PC1",y="PC2"))+geom_point()
plot(pd[,1],pd[,2])

res2<-Rtsne(t(deleteomeData))
pd2<-res2$Y
plot(pd2[,1],pd2[,2])
```
